Setting Up Your Profile
Default settings are used before you set up your customized profile. For more accurate BAC calculations, please update your profile.

This app was created to help hokies monitor their drinking, by keeping track of thier standard drinks. We use a BAC calculator to estimate your BAC and a reaction time game to test your reaction time.\n

Legal Driving Zone BAC <= .08%

We calculate your BAC with the standard drinks below: 
Beer: 12 oz - 4.5% ABV 
Wine: 5 oz - 12.5% ABV 
Shot: 1.5 oz - 40.0% ABV
Research shows that there is a strong correlation between reaction time and level of drunkenness. People have 25% slower reaction time when drunk than when sober.
